entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -5.7Â°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
